Uses of Interface
org.cougaar.core.component.Service

Packages that use Service
org.cougaar.core.agent This package contains the Cougaar agent base class and bootstrapping components. 
org.cougaar.core.agent.service   
org.cougaar.core.agent.service.containment   
org.cougaar.core.blackboard This package contains the Cougaar publish/subscribe BlackboardService. 
org.cougaar.core.component   
org.cougaar.core.domain This package contains the Cougaar DomainManager and LogicProvider interfaces. 
org.cougaar.core.logging   
org.cougaar.core.mobility This package contains the Cougaar agent mobility support. 
org.cougaar.core.mts This package contains the Cougaar support classes required to implement the MessageTransportService, such as MessageAddress. 
org.cougaar.core.mts.singlenode This package contains a single-node MTS implementation, created for performance characterization and MTS overhead computation. 
org.cougaar.core.node This package contains the Cougaar JVM node and node-level services. 
org.cougaar.core.node.service   
org.cougaar.core.persist This package contains the Cougaar persistence and rehydration support. 
org.cougaar.core.qos.coordinations.selectserver   
org.cougaar.core.qos.frame Overview: The Cougaar Frame infrastructure provides a lightweight and efficiently distributed form of knowledge representation supporting two independent inheritance hierarchies, path following, and code generation. 
org.cougaar.core.qos.gossip The Gossip subsystem allows Metrics collected on one Node to be disseminated to other Nodes in the society. 
org.cougaar.core.qos.metrics This package contains the Cougaar "Quality of Service" (QoS) support for runtime metrics. 
org.cougaar.core.qos.profile Utility components to periodically log performance metrics, such as the cpu load and message traffic. 
org.cougaar.core.qos.rss This package defines an implemenation of the metrics services that uses the ResourceStatusService (RSS) as its underlying infrastructure. 
org.cougaar.core.qos.tmatrix   
org.cougaar.core.service This package contains the Cougaar primary core service APIs.

org.cougaar.core.service.identity

org.cougaar.core.servlet

org.cougaar.core.wp.resolver   
org.cougaar.core.wp.server   
org.cougaar.lib.web.engine   
org.cougaar.lib.web.redirect   
org.cougaar.lib.web.service This package contains the Cougaar implementation of the ServletService, which provides HTTP access into Cougaar agents. 
org.cougaar.mts.base This package contains the core software components and infrastructure for the full Message Transport Service, including interceptor Stations, base classes, MTS services, mandatory Aspects, and loopback LinkProtocol. 
org.cougaar.mts.rmi This package contains the RMI and RMI-SSL link protocols. 
org.cougaar.mts.std This package contains optional MTS software components that are used for a production Cougaar runtime. 
org.cougaar.mts.std.debug This package contains optional MTS components used for debugging and testing Cougaar internals. 
org.cougaar.mts.std.experimental This package contains experimental MTS software components that extend the behavior of the MTS. 
org.cougaar.planning.ldm

Uses of Service in org.cougaar.core.agent
 

Subinterfaces of Service in org.cougaar.core.agent
 interface AgentBootstrapService
          This service allows a component to modify its agent's list of components as it is being loaded, which is part of the agent's bootstrap process.
 interface AgentComponentModelService
          This service allows a component to capture its agent's component model state.
 interface AgentStateModelService
          This service allows a component within the agent to transition the agent's state (suspend/resume/stop/unload).
 interface FindComponentsLoadService
          This service is used by the agent's component model rehydration to signal rehydration from a persistence snapshot, which must occur after the agent identity is acquired.
 interface MessageSwitchShutdownService
          This service is used to shutdown the MessageSwitch during agent "suspend()" and restart the message switch during agent "resume()".
 interface MessageSwitchUnpendService
          This service is used to "unpend" buffered messages at the end of agent load.
 interface ReconcileAddressWatcherService
          This service tracks blackboard message traffic, which is used to poll for agent restarts and force reconciliation in case state was lost.
 interface ReconcileEnablerService
          This service is used to start and stop blackboard reconciliation when the agent is starting/stopping/etc.
 interface RehydrateLoadService
          This service is used by the agent rehydration components to signal rehydration from a persistence snapshot, which must occur after the agent identity is acquired.
 interface TopologyService
          This service is used by the MessageSwitch to obtain the local agent's incarnation number, which is updated every time the agent is rehydrated (but not on moves).

Uses of Service in org.cougaar.core.service
 

Subinterfaces of Service in org.cougaar.core.service
 interface AgentContainmentService
          This service allows a component to add/remove components from its agent.
 interface AgentIdentificationService
          This service provides the local agent's MessageAddress.
 interface AgentQuiescenceStateService
          This service allows a component to query the agents registered with the node's QuiescenceReportService and mark agents as dead (ignorable) when they have been restarted on another node.
 interface AlarmService
          This service provides access to the time-based alarm services (real-time and execution-time).
 interface AppletService
          This service provides access to Applet methods, and is only available if the node was launched from within a browser Applet.
 interface BlackboardMetricsService
          This service provides primitive blackboard metrics.
 interface BlackboardQueryService
          This service offers a lightweight query-only version of BlackboardService.
 interface BlackboardService
          This service provides transactional publish/subscribe access to the local agent's blackboard.
 interface BlackboardTimestampService
          This service tracks timestamps for the ADD (BlackboardService.publishAdd(java.lang.Object)) and the more recent modification (BlackboardService.publishChange(java.lang.Object)) of UniqueObjects.
 interface ConditionService
          This service is used by the AdaptivityEngine to look up sensor data on the blackboard.
 interface ConfigurationService
          This service provides access to the file system by searching the configuration path.
 interface DataProtectionService
          This service is used by persistence to sign/encrypt an OutputStream and verify/decrypt an InputStream.
 interface DemoControlService
          This service controls the execution time in AlarmService.currentTimeMillis() and AlarmService.addAlarm(org.cougaar.core.agent.service.alarm.Alarm).
 interface DomainForBlackboardService
          This service is an extended DomainService for the Blackboard's use.
 interface DomainService
          This service provides access to Domain object Factorys.
 interface EventService
          This service is used to log assessment events.
 interface IncarnationService
          This service tracks agent incarnation numbers, which are updated every time the agent restarts (excluding agent mobility).
 interface JvmStackDumpService
          This service requests a JVM-wide stack dump.
 interface LoggingService
          This Service provides a generic logging API.
 interface MessageProtectionService
          This service is used to cryptographically protect incoming and outgoing messages.
 interface MessageStatisticsService
          This service provides message transport statistics, such as the total number of messages sent by the local node.
 interface MessageTransportService
          This service is the node-level message transport that agents use to send and receive messages.
 interface MessageWatcherService
          This service allows components to watch message send/receive activity.
 interface NodeMetricsService
          This service provides simple node-level metrics.
 interface OperatingModeService
          This service is used by the AdaptivityEngine to find OperatingModes on the blackboard.
 interface PersistenceControlService
          This service can be used to view and modify persistence settings.
 interface PlaybookConstrainService
          This service allows components to modify AdaptivityEngine plays and playbooks.
 interface PlaybookReadService
          This service is used by the AdaptivityEngine to get the list of current plays.
 interface QuiescenceReportForDistributorService
          This service is used by the Distributor to tell the node when a local agent is quiescent or not.
 interface QuiescenceReportService
          This service is used by components to tell the node the initial quiescence numbering and to toggle between quiescence and non-quiescence.
 interface SchedulerService
          This service is used to schedule plugins for thread execution.
 interface ServletService
          This service can be used to register a Servlet for all HTTP requests that match a specified String path.
 interface SocketFactoryService
          This service is used to get a socket factory, such as an RMISocketFactory.
 interface SuicideService
          This service is used to tell the agent (or node) to exit, for example due to an OutOfMemoryError.
 interface ThreadControlService
          This service controls the ThreadService.
 interface ThreadListenerService
          This service allows components to watch ThreadService activity.
 interface ThreadService
          This service provides a Schedulables to execute a Runnable.run() method within a pooled thread.
 interface UIDServer
          This service is the backwards-compatible API for the UIDService.
 interface UIDService
          This service provides UIDs, which are globally unique object identifiers.
 interface WebServicesService
          This service allows a component to register a WSDD (Web Services Deployment Descriptor) to receive remote Web Services XML-based calls.

          BlackboardService.Delegate is an instantiable convenience class which may be used by Binder writers to bind BlackboardService, either as a simple protective indirection layer, or as the base class for more complex behavior.

          Delegate class for easing implementation of Binders, etc

          This service is used by advertisers to listen for local agent bind/unbind changes.

          This service is used by the client's server selection to start/stop the discovery components.

          This service provides Bundles for local agents bound in the LeaseManager.

          This service provides the initial Bundle configuration.

          This service is used by the peer manager to ensure that server peers are found by the discovery bootstrapper.

          This service is provided by the CacheManager to bootstrap discovered Bundles into the local cache.

          This service is used by servers to locate theirs peers, which is required for replication.
 interface ServersService
          This service is used by the SelectManager to list potental servers.

          This service is the CacheManager's interface for the Resolver for cache lookups.

          This service is the LeaseManager's interface for the Resolver for bind/unbind requests.

          This service is the ClientTransport's interface for the LeaseManager for sending bind/unbind messages.

 interface SelectService
          This service is the "server selection service" advertised by the SelectManager that the ClientTransport uses to select a white pages server.

Uses of Service in org.cougaar.mts.base
 

Subinterfaces of Service in org.cougaar.mts.base
 interface AspectSupport
          This is an MTS-internal utility service which supports the use of aspects.
 interface DestinationQueueMonitorService
          This is an MTS-internal service, accessible only to child components of the MTS, that allows those components to examine the state of any given DestinationQueue.
 interface DestinationQueueProviderService
          This is the factory service for getting a queue for a given destination.
 interface LinkProtocolService
          Abstract layer for interacting with a LinkProtocol as a service
 interface LinkSelectionPolicy
          The selection of a DestinationLink is handled by this MTS-internal service, which is accessible only to MTS components.
 interface LinkSelectionProvisionService
          This MTS-internal service can be used to get and set the current LinkSelectionPolicy.
 interface MessageDeliverer
          The first or second station for an outgoing message on the receive side is a MessageDeliverer (first if no serialization, second otherwise).
 interface MessageTransportRegistryService
          This is a utility/bookkeeping service for the MTS.
 interface NameSupport
          This utility service hides the grimy details of dealing with NameServers and White Pages from the rest of the message transport subsystem.
 interface OutOfBandMessageService
          Within the MTS we sometimes need to send internal messages directly to a given Agent.
 interface QueueProviderService
          Generic service specialized by DestinationQueueProviderService and SendQueueProviderService.
 interface ReceiveLinkProviderService
          This is the factory service for getting a ReceiveLink for a given destination.
 interface Router
          The third station for an outgoing message.
static interface RPCLinkProtocol.Service
           
 interface SendQueueProviderService
          This is the factory service for getting a queue for a given sender.
 interface SocketControlProvisionService
          This MTS-internal service can be used to get and set the current SocketControlPolicy.
